column4: Can someone whisper me regarding some driver issues I'm having?
@xt: Averatec laptop, 7.04 ubuntu; LAN is completely unrecognized and (to my knowlege) a driver doesn't exist for it, so I'm trying to install a driver for the wireless card.
'completely' unrecognized?  does it detect it over the PCI bus?
well boot a livecd no the laptop
oh well that's good.  it loaded a driver.  you just need to learn how to use the wireless
ok dont give up.  it's probably something silly like being unassociated with an acces point.  verdict is, your driver has been loaded
sudo iwconfig ra1 ap 00:00:00:00:00:00  should do it...
hm i dont even know what that's supposed to do
